name: update-playlist-storage
description: Retrieve and store current playlist payload in a public Cloud Storage bucket
author: Steve Lund <lund5000@gmail.com>

scripts.deploy:dev: gcloud functions deploy updatePlaylistStorage --project chirpradiodev --runtime=nodejs20 --trigger-topic update_playlist_storage --docker-registry=artifact-registry
scripts.deploy: gcloud functions deploy updatePlaylistStorage --project chirpradio-hrd --runtime=nodejs20 --trigger-topic update_playlist_storage --docker-registry=artifact-registry
